allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "UPDATE system_settings SET setting_value = ''logo.svg'' WHERE setting_key = ''company_logo'';")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT setting_key, setting_value FROM system_settings WHERE category = ''company'' OR setting_key LIKE ''%company%'' ORDER BY setting_key;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_settings GROUP BY category;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "UPDATE system_settings SET setting_value = ''logo.png'' WHERE setting_key = ''company_logo'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root hajj_management -e "SELECT setting_key, LEFT(setting_value, 50) as value_preview, category FROM system_settings ORDER BY category, setting_key;")
